attributes.action: stop corruption in the police professional standards and police force
attributes.additional_details: Make it law that a member of the police force are allowed to be prosecuted for wrong doings
attributes.background: Make corrupt police staff accountable for corruption, criminal proceedings for corrupt decision making that lead to a wrong conviction due to police lies, PSD lies and cover ups

rejection.details:
Police officers can already be disciplined, dismissed or prosecuted for the actions you outline in your petition.

Decisions about disciplinary matters relating to police officers are a matter for the relevant police force and the Independent Office for Police Conduct, and investigating and prosecuting alleged crimes are a matter for the police and Crown Prosecution Service, not the Government or Parliament.

If you want to complain about a specific police officer or police force you can find out how to do so here: https://www.policeconduct.gov.uk/complaints-reviews-and-appeals/make-complaint
